input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
there were a lot of musicians there .
there were also many street performers .
i bought some of the local produce .
they had some very good food there .
output.sentences: Excited that my weekend vacation has finally begun, I race downtown to see what is going on today.
The amazing melodic music I heard drew me to a street performer by the fountain playing the most beautiful music.
After the street performer was finished with his bit I began to walk some more and came across a man preaching about the word of God.
Across the street I see some vibrant vegetables and the colors and smell begged me to go and buy a bag of them.
Once I was finished I had began thinking of the entertainers I saw and the vegetable at the market so decided to end the day cooking up the carrots I had bought.
